casebody.data:
Argued April 24, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. CURTIS RONALD HATCHARD, Appellant. (No. 32580) 508 P2d 819 J. Marvin Kuhn, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. Thomas H. Denney, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed April 24, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Fort, Judges.
